ngiemboon: Afùɔ lɔɔn ńtóŋo gú, ɔ̀ zẅíŋ lê Mbɛ̀ɛ.
en: If the king calls you, you accept by saying “Majesty”.

ngiemboon: Saŋ te ne ńtʉ́a wɔ́ péʼe, ejʉʼ síŋ lê mbíd lêtsẅɛʼ.
en: When the moon does not shine, it is very dark at night.
Here is the bean, where is the one that pulps?

ngiemboon: Mekú lɔɔn te tʉ mboŋó wɔ́, é júm ḿbiɛ piɛ.
en: If the bean is not fully mature, it will be flattened when it dries.
